name: Platypus Big Zip EVO Lumbar Drink Tube Kit
categories: Big Zip EVO Lumbar Drink Tube Kit
description: If your dog used the tube on your Big Zip Evo Lumbar reservoir as its new chew-toy, get this replacement drink tube kit to get back on the trail without feeling thirsty.Specific tube lengths for the Platypus Big Zip EVO Lumbar reservoir.Includes a drink tube with quick-disconnect fitting, a Big Zip EVO shut-off valve, lapel attachment and a HyFLO™ bite valve.
